description: CodeWeaver-MCP is the context layer for MCP, add data, providers, backends, services from anywhere and bring them together to deliver intelligent context to your AI coding assistants.
rules: CodeWeaver uses a factory pattern with DI for sources, providers, backends, services, and an NLP intent layer that resolves LLM-user needs into actionable context.
All components are fully configurable with CodeWeaver's TOML config system, built on pydantic-settings.
New source/provider/backends/services providers can be added by implementing the respective interfaces and registering them in the factory.
